mapper.select: SELECT X.BOOK_SEQ FROM (SELECT B.BOOK_SEQ, B.STATUS_TITLE, B.STATUS_CODE, A.RETURN_DATE, B.BOOK_CODE, COUNT(*) OVER (PARTITION BY B.BOOK_CODE) AS BOOK_COUNT FROM BOOK_BORROW A RIGHT JOIN BOOK_STATUS B ON A.BOOK_SEQ = B.BOOK_SEQ WHERE (RETURN_DATE <= CURRENT_DATE -60 OR RETURN_DATE IS NULL) AND STATUS_CODE = 'A') X WHERE X.BOOK_COUNT > 1
mapper.update: UPDATE BOOK_STATUS SET STATUS_CODE='B' WHERE BOOK_SEQ IN( SELECT X.BOOK_SEQ FROM (SELECT B.BOOK_SEQ, B.STATUS_TITLE, B.STATUS_CODE, A.RETURN_DATE, B.BOOK_CODE, COUNT(*) OVER (PARTITION BY B.BOOK_CODE) AS BOOK_COUNT FROM BOOK_BORROW A RIGHT JOIN BOOK_STATUS B ON A.BOOK_SEQ = B.BOOK_SEQ WHERE (RETURN_DATE <= TO_DATE('20230913' || '000000', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') -60 OR RETURN_DATE IS NULL) AND STATUS_CODE = 'A') X WHERE X.BOOK_COUNT > 1 )
UPDATE BOOK_STATUS SET STATUS_CODE=#{status_code} WHERE BOOK_SEQ =#{book_seq}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT STATUS_TITLE, STATUS_CODE, BOOK_CODE, BOOK_PRICE FROM BOOK_STOCK BT LEFT JOIN BOOK_STATUS BS ON BT.BOOK_SEQ = BS.BOOK_SEQ WHERE STATUS_CODE = 'B'
SELECT DISTINCT ISBN,TITLE,A.BOOK_CODE, AUTHOR,GENRE_CODE,PUBLISHER,PRICE,PUBLISH_DATE,THUMBNAIL FROM BOOKINFO A JOIN BOOK_STATUS C ON A.BOOK_CODE=C.BOOK_CODE WHERE STATUS_CODE='B'

SELECT ISBN,TITLE, BOOK_CODE, AUTHOR, GENRE_CODE, PUBLISHER, PRICE, PUBLISH_DATE, THUMBNAIL FROM ( SELECT ISBN, BOOK_CODE, AUTHOR, GENRE_CODE, PUBLISHER,TITLE, PRICE, PUBLISH_DATE, THUMBNAIL, ROW_NUMBER () OVER (ORDER BY TITLE) AS row_num FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT ISBN,TITLE,A.BOOK_CODE, AUTHOR,GENRE_CODE,PUBLISHER, PRICE,PUBLISH_DATE,THUMBNAIL FROM BOOKINFO A JOIN BOOK_STATUS C ON A.BOOK_CODE=C.BOOK_CODE WHERE STATUS_CODE='B' ) ) WHERE row_num BETWEEN #{first} AND #{last}

SELECT B.BOOK_CODE,ISBN,TITLE,STOCK_NUMBER,B.BOOK_SEQ,BOOK_PRICE, AUTHOR,GENRE_CODE,PUBLISHER,PUBLISH_DATE,THUMBNAIL FROM BOOKINFO A JOIN BOOK_STATUS B ON A.BOOK_CODE=B.BOOK_CODE JOIN BOOK_STOCK C ON B.BOOK_SEQ=C.BOOK_SEQ WHERE STATUS_CODE='B'AND A.BOOK_CODE =#{book_code}
SELECT STOCK_NUMBER,STATUS_TITLE, BOOK_SEQ AS STBOOK_SEQ, STATUS_CODE, BOOK_CODE, BOOK_PRICE FROM BOOK_STOCK BT LEFT JOIN BOOK_STATUS USING(BOOK_SEQ) WHERE STATUS_CODE = 'A'

SELECT STOCK_NUMBER,STATUS_TITLE, STBOOK_SEQ, STATUS_CODE, BOOK_CODE, BOOK_PRICE FROM (SELECT STOCK_NUMBER,STATUS_TITLE, BOOK_SEQ AS STBOOK_SEQ, STATUS_CODE, BOOK_CODE, BOOK_PRICE,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY STATUS_TITLE) RN FROM BOOK_STOCK BT LEFT JOIN BOOK_STATUS USING(BOOK_SEQ) WHERE STATUS_CODE = 'A') WHERE RN BETWEEN #{first} AND ${last}

SELECT STOCK_NUMBER,STATUS_TITLE, BT.BOOK_SEQ AS STBOOK_SEQ, STATUS_CODE, BOOK_CODE, BOOK_PRICE FROM BOOK_STOCK BT LEFT JOIN BOOK_STATUS BS ON BT.BOOK_SEQ = BS.BOOK_SEQ WHERE BOOK_CODE=#{book_code} AND STATUS_CODE='B'
mapper.update: UPDATE BOOK_STOCK SET BOOK_PRICE=#{price} WHERE STOCK_NUMBER =#{number}
